channel.title: Can't use website for Hiscores?
channel.description: For some reason I can't get my hiscores to connect to my godaddy mysql database. I setup 5 of them, and none of them work. SQL class: [code=java]con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com/sshiscores","sshiscores","*MyPassword*");[/code] "sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com" is my host name, "sshiscores" is my db name and username. But it works on localhost: [code=java]con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/sagehighscores","root","*MyPassword*");[/code]Using xampp. My website is hosted on linux webhost, and my computer is Ubuntu Linux 11.04. [code]MySQL Database Information Status:Setup Host Name:sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com Database Name:sshiscores Database Version:5.0 Description:For hiscores User Name:sshiscores[/code]

item.title: Can't use website for Hiscores?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

marcbob:

instead of sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com try the IP of your actually sql file. I use godaddy too, and when you manage the certain sql database it will show you the IP of it. Try that

Still doesn’t work, :’( When I run my server, it just stays at “Online.” and when I use my server status checker it still says online, and it doesn’t say I connected to my server in the command prompt.
EDIT: I’ll just use a frame thing instead of putting them on my website. Something like [code=php]

SageScape Hiscores [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Can't use website for Hiscores?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

For some reason I can’t get my hiscores to connect to my godaddy mysql database. I setup 5 of them, and none of them work. SQL class: con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com/sshiscores","sshiscores","*MyPassword*");
“sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com” is my host name, “sshiscores” is my db name and username. But it works on localhost: con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/sagehighscores","root","*MyPassword*");Using xampp. My website is hosted on linux webhost, and my computer is Ubuntu Linux 11.04.

MySQL Database Information Status:Setup Host Name:sshiscores.db.6576216.hostedresource.com Database Name:sshiscores Database Version:5.0 Description:For hiscores User Name:sshiscores

Read full topic
